name: ADRENALINE!!!
description:
Hey! Your adrenaline supplies are running low and your canned food ran out a long time ago? Don't worry! Your government cares about you even during these difficult times.
We sent this cassette to all ADRENALIN 2 users, so you could just sit on your couch and enjoy death. Feeling hungry or thirsty? Just turn on one of these! Yes, they're sent to you on a daily basis so that you can satisfy your needs.
Just remember one thing: it's all movies. You shouldn't do something like this in real life to replenish your adrenaline. It's all movies!!

Featuring:

  • Synthwave soundtrack;
  • Beat `em up gameplay;
  • Society where everyone depends on adrenaline
  • Cute robots!
Developers: GroundDoon - Gamedesign,Code; JustDenys1 - Art; Xordazh (dedborsh) - Music, Story, Original idea; Миша Razer (Wish) - Editor; art.sidorov (Ejkawai) - Coverart. Maded for Wholesome Jam 2022 under 2 days.
